concept.title: Render materials panel
concept.shortdesc: The Render Materials panel offers access to materials used for renderings.

conbody.p: Material definitions are saved in the drawing. Each drawing contains the Global material. It is not possible to delete or rename the Global material, however you can edit the properties of the Global material.

section.title: Material library
section.p: The material library is organized by categories. You can select a material from a category and then apply it to an entity using the brush that appears. You can scroll through the materials using the mouse wheel or the scroll bar.

section.title: Home
section.p: Returns the material library to the home screen.

section.title: Search
section.p: Searches the library for words you enter in the search box.
